short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the weather and sites you visit frequently, all on your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your old ugly New Tab page with FlexStart! A startpage featuring the weather for your location, and all of the sites you visit most often. The background of your FlexStart page is chosen randomly out of a collection of Material Design wallpapers.
